comments.content:
This is **[Harry Plain](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142745/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Image-Club-Graphics&ffam=Harry%20Plain%20-%20Regular&fid=327fc8f76b5a3afd2b5c320736749f03&fsize=60&text=pure%20fun&fit=1)** once upon a time [1992] digitized by Image-Club-Graphics, now also available by RedRooster collection.

According to myfonts.com:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/harry-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142745/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/harry-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/harry-pro/")

> This revival of Harry is based on the original design by Marty Goldstein (and C.B. Smith).  
> Goldstein, born in Chicago in 1939, was the co-founder of the groundbreaking Creative Black Book. He graduated from the Pratt Institute in 1960.  
> Harry, first published by VGC in 1966, was named for his father. ITF has added four new weights to the original six.
